update.name: qmeta v1.0.0-initial
update.features: Quick Navigation, Search Translation, Surah Index, Tags, qNote Editor

entries.log: Add Quick Navigation, available in full version
Add Search Translation, support for multiple search entries in full version
Add Surah Index, add sorting options: ascending, descending, revelation order, aya count+ and aya count-
Add qNote Editor, available in full version
